name: 3D statement hair clip asst.colours
description:
Lovely silken hair bow clip. Stuffed to give it a 3D quality and make more of an impact. Available in 6 different colours. Select which colour by using the main picture as a guide. (Peacock is the darker of the two blues)

Compliments the bow t-shirts also available in a variety of sizes.

(please note all cards are sealed individually in plastic to protect them)


SOLD OUT OF PINK AND PEACOCK

name: Pirate eye patch
description:
Beautifully presented pirate eye patch made from soft brushed cotton with an elasticated strap. A simple gift that will give hours of fun and help all those imaginary stores come to life!





(please note all cards are sealed individually in plastic to protect them)

name: Lunch bag  asst.colours
description:
Durable cotton canvas lunch bag. Big enough to hold all your daily snacks and treats! Hand printed using eco-friendly inks on an unbleached heavy weight cotton with strong but soft cotton handles.

Available in red and green
Hand or cool wash at 30 degrees using non-bio.

name: 'Bowl of utensils' apron
description:
This 100% cotton apron has been hand silk screen printed with three utencils which appear to be resting in a large mixing bowl. The bowl is actually a pocket and the utensils are printed right down inside the pocket.

Printed onto a heavy weight unbleached cotton canvas using eco -friendly inks, this apron is sure to delight.

Available in sizes 1-3yrs and 3-6yrs (print size can be seen on the images)

name: Teddy Bears / Dolls picnic blanket
description:
Hand silk screen printed, role play picnic blanket. A little larger than your average sized tea towel, this adorable gingham blanket will provide hours of fun for picnics and parties. Your little one can cook Mummy and Daddy a meal and lay it all out, or perfect for lone play with a favourite toy.

Double layer Gingham blankets, available in pink or yellow, with grey print. Machine wash at 30 degrees.

name: Bow T-shirt
description:
A really fun and colourful t-shirt. Perfect for parties and especially for those little extroverts who like to get noticed!

Two colour ways, each features three oversized stuffed bows in decreasing sizes.

100% cotton T-shirt. Grey marl with either 
*Peacock, magenta & neon orange or 
* Turquoise, neon pink & yellow coloured bows.

Available in sizes: 3-4yrs, 5-6yrs or 7-8yrs

name: 'Little red fox' Jumper
description:
SALE! WAS £48 NOW £39!

Limited edition fox print jumper by Rosie MacCurrach.

This adorable jumper has been silk screen printed and embroidered with complementary coloured silk threads. There is a little peach coloured, wool pom pom on the cheek.

Made using eco-friendly inks.

Available in size 3-4yrs only

name: 'Rainbow drop' cotton T-shirt
description:
Multi coloured rain drop print cotton T-shirt. A fun repeat motif which appears on many of 'nyny's ' products. The rain doesn't have to be annoying or bothersome, Go out and dance in the rain! Its not all grey........

100% unbleached organic cotton, printed using eco-friendly inks.

Available in sizes: 5-6yrs and 7-8yrs

name: Limited edition hand screen printed cards
description:
SALE: Was £3.50 Now £3.00

Limited edition silk screen print. Hand printed using eco-friendly inks. All cards are left blank and come with colour co-ordinating envelopes, sealed in plastic.

There are currently three options:

Clouds: This card has been hand printed with 7 colours using 3 seperate silk screens. Each print is unique as variation and imperfection are the beauty of this organic printing process. 
Edition of: 30

Ice cream: This card has been hand printed with 8 colours using 5 seperate silk screens. Each print is unique as variation and imperfection are the beauty of this organic printing process. 
Edition of: 40

Ice lolly: This card has been hand printed with 6 colours using 3 seperate silk screens. Each print is unique as variation and imperfection are the beauty of this organic printing process. 
Edition of: 40

name: Canvas 'house' print shoppers
description:
Lovely childrens canvas shopper. Perfect for days out, shopping with Mummy, or indeed just to hang stuff up in your house.

This bag is made from a soft but durable chunky canvas, (not like cheap calico versions), to withstand the 'tugging' and 'dragging' that is inevitable with children. 

Each bag is hand screen printed on both sides. Every bag is unique as variation and imperfection are the beauty of this organic printing process. 

* Features lovely round corners, so small things dont get lost
* size: 32cm wide, 35cm deep 
* Handle length: 41cm . For ages 2-3 yrs+
* Printed with eco-friendly inks on 100% cotton

Available in either pink or orange colour ways. Each bag has a different coloured cloud on the reverse.

name: Big cloud mobile
description:
This cloud mobile makes a great decoration for children's bedrooms. It is fun and light hearted and makes an interesting focal or talking point in quirky interiors. Hang alongside others of different sizes to create your very own interior skyscape.

* Made from a variety of pure Cashmere and Lambswool with a lightweight polyester stuffing 

* Hanging loop to allow for easy positioning

* Big clouds measure approx: 32cm deep inc.drops but not hanging loop & 32cm wide. 

* Small clouds measuer approx: 17cm inc. drops but not hanging loop & 22cm wide

Clouds come in light, mid or dark grey. Mid or light blue and have multicoloured rain drops.

The exact dimensions of each cloud and ratio of cashmere to lambswool varies, as each item is handmade. To find out more about an exact item or to have your own cloud custom made in your chosen colours please send a message using the form provided. E-mails of our current collection can be sent to you.

name: Wool and cashmere toy snakes
description:
Beautiful lambswool soft toy snake, With real leather tongue and beautifully sculpted facial features. Truely unique, each snake is different, with no two ever the same. 

This makes it a great gift for a newborn, baby shower or toddlers birthday party. The snake is designed so that it can be hung or draped around your shoulders and also tied in knots, which is great fun. It is relatively strong but obiously not designed for a 'tug of war'!



*Baby snake with multi coloured stripes and blue eyes
Measures: 121cm long approx
Weighs: 70gm approx

*Giant snake with vintage colours
Measures: 240cm long approx
Weighs: 330gm approx

each snake contains: pure lambswool, cashmere, leather and polyester stuffing.

Each snake is a real beauty, lovingly handcrafted with great charachter and is looking for a little friend to love and play with!

Please enquire about different colours or to have a custom snake made up especially for you.

name: Small cloud mobiles
description:
This cloud mobile makes a great decoration for childrens bedrooms. It is fun and lighthearted and makes an interesting focal or talking point in quirky interiors. Hang alongside others in the range or different sizes to create your very own interior syscape.

* Made from a variety of pure Cashmere and Lambswool with a lightweight polyester stuffing 

* Hanging loop to allow for easy positioning

* Big clouds measure approx: 32cm deep inc.drops but not loop & 32cm wide. Old style approx: 27cm wide with a 35cm depth.

* Small clouds measuer approx: 17cm inc. drops but not loop & 22cm wide

The exact dimensions of each cloud and ratio of cashmere to lambswool varies, as each item is handmade. To find out more about an exact item or to have your own cloud custom made in your chosen colours please send a message using the form provided.

Please note that all clouds are different and the colour combinations you see are just for show. You will be sent a randomly selected combination of raindrops unless you specify what colours you prefer upon making a purhase.

name: Owl postcard set
description:
Block print owl postcards in pink and brown.

Set of 4 (2 of each colour).

Hand printed on thick cream hammered card.

name: Foiled raindrop t-shirt
description:
Hand silk screen printed using gold foil. This simple slim fitting t-shirt will bring colour to any rainy day! T-shirt is optic white, with pink, red, blue and orange raindrops as well as gold foil printed onto it.

Sizes: 4yrs or 7yrs left

Hand or cool wash at 30 degrees using non-bio

name: Screen print baby T-shirts
description:
Hand silk screen printed baby T-shirts in a variety of designs. A sweet boxy shaped T-shirt that is nicely loose fitting to keep baby cool in the summer months.

100% cotton T-shirt printed with eco-friendly inks

Three designs available:

*Blue shirt with grey cloud
*White or pink shirt with flowers
*Yellow shirt with blue umbrella

Available in sizes 1-2yrs or 2-3yrs

name: Big cloud mobiles
description:
This cloud mobile makes a great decoration for children's bedrooms. It is fun and light hearted and makes an interesting focal or talking point in quirky interiors. Hang alongside others of different sizes to create your very own interior skyscape.

* Made from a variety of pure Cashmere and Lambswool with a lightweight polyester stuffing

To find out more about an exact item or to have your own cloud custom made in your chosen colours please send a message using the form provided. E-mails of our current collection can be sent to you.

name: Unique hand print quilts / play mats SALE!
description:
WAS £95 NOW £75!

Cloud print quilt / play mat: 
Hand printed clouds on a cotton calico backing. Quilted and faced with a soft brushed cotton and contrast cotton jersey edging.

This quilt is a sample piece. It is truely unique and the only one to be made. No other exists like it. 

This fine weight quilt would make a great gift for a baby and would be lovely as either a play mat or a bed spread. It is soft and safe for both baby and children.

This blanket measures: 113cm by 113cm

Contains: Cotton calico, brushed cotton, polyester wadding, cotton jersey and eco friendly ink.


British summer Blanket/ play mat: (Umbrella print)
Hand printed on a cotton calico backing. Faced with a soft brushed cotton and contrast cotton jersey edging.

This blanket is a sample piece. It is truely unique and the only one to be made. No other exists like it. 

This fine weight blanket would make a great gift for a baby or child and would be lovely as either a play mat or a summer bed spread. It is soft and safe for both baby and child.

This blanket measures: 119cm by 119cm

Contains: Cotton calico, brushed cotton, cotton jersey and eco friendly ink. It is very lightweight as it is only two layers of fabric.

Feel free to ask to see more pictures, as this is a sample it may be slightly less than perfect but is still gorgeous and any defects do not alter the quality or the overall look of the item.

Feel free to ask to see more pictures, as this is a sample it may be slightly less than perfect but is still gorgeous and any defects do not alter the quality or the overall look of the item.

name: Hobby Horse (vintage print)
description:
WAS £85 NOW £65!

Beautiful hobby horse. Handmade and completely unique. No two are alike in any way. Every child is truely unique and should have something that expresses this.  Each horse features lovely handmade leather bridles, with reins that can be pulled over the head, to lead. As well as real wooden poles. These toys are really special, to be passed down by generations, loved and admired. They are a breath of fresh air in this disposable society and would be a delight to grace any home or interior. They could also make a beautiful decoration for those that dont have children!

Suitable for ages from 2 to about 5/6.

This horse is made from a vintage 70's print brushed cotton. the mane is acrylic, bridle is leather, hardware is nickel and the pole is wooden.


Will be delivered free within London, UK.
